content.json:
# Azure OpenAI Insights
Use this workbook to analyze and monitor all your Azure OpenAI resources.

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Subscriptions
parameters.description: All subscriptions with Azure OpenAI Service
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.label: Azure OpenAI Service
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = id, selected = Rank <= 5

parameters.name: Message
parameters.query:
where type == 'microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts' 
| summarize Selected = countif(id in ({Resources:value})), Total = count()
| extend Selected = iff(Selected > 200, 200, Selected)
| project Message = strcat('# ', Selected, ' / ', Total)

parameters.name: ResourceImageUrl
parameters.description: used as a parameter for No Subcriptions workbook template

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by subscriptionId
content.title: Count by Subscription Id

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by resourceGroup
content.title: Count by Resource Group

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by location
content.title: Count by Location

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by kind
content.title: Count by Kind

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by tostring(properties.publicNetworkAccess)
content.title: Count by Public Network Access

items.name: query - Count by Public Network Access

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend privateEndpointConnections = properties.privateEndpointConnections
| extend privateEndpointConnections = iff(privateEndpointConnections == '[]','Disabled','Enabled')
| summarize count(type) by tostring(privateEndpointConnections)
content.title: Count by Private Network Access

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where kind =~ "OpenAI"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project Resource=id, resourceGroup, location, subscriptionId, kind, SKU=sku.name, publicNetworkAccess=properties.publicNetworkAccess, privateEndpointConnections=properties.privateEndpointConnections, dateCreated=properties.dateCreated, tags, Details
content.title: Azure OpenAI

content.json:
### Azure OpenAI Metrics Dashboard
Explore the most important metrics for Azure OpenAI Service and understand your usage trends easily.
[Azure OpenAI Metrics](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/how-to/monitoring#azure-openai-metrics)

items.name: Metric - Prompt Token Cache Match Rate

content.json:
#### Metrics Description
- **Azure OpenAI Requests**: Number of calls made to the Azure OpenAI API over a period of time. (Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments)
- **Time to Response**: Recommended latency (responsiveness) measure for streaming requests. Calculated as time taken for the first response to appear after a user sends a prompt, as measured by the API gateway. This number increases as the prompt size increases and/or cache hit size reduces. (Applies to PTU and PTU-managed deployments)
- **Prompt Token Cache Match Rate**: Percentage of the prompt tokens hit the cache,. (Applies to PTU-managed)

items.name: Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by Model Name
Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by Model Version
Metric - Requests by Model Deployment Name
Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by StreamType
Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by Operation Name
Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by API Name
Metric - Azure OpenAI Requests by Region

content.title: Time to Response by Model Deployment Name

items.name: Metric - Azure OpenAI Time to Response by Model Deployment Name

content.title: Prompt Token Cache Match Rate by Model Name

items.name: Metric - Azure OpenAI Prompt Token Cache Match Rate by Model Name

content.title: Prompt Token Cache Match Rate by Model Deployment Name

items.name: Metric - Azure OpenAI Prompt Token Cache Match Rate by Model Deployment Name

content.json:
### Metrics Description
- **Processed Inference Tokens**: Number of inference tokens processed on an OpenAI model. Calculated as prompt tokens (input) plus generated tokens (output).
- **Processed Prompt Tokens**: Number of prompt tokens processed (input) on an OpenAI model.
- **Generated Completion Tokens**: Number of tokens generated (output) from an OpenAI model.
- **Active tokens**: Total tokens minus cached tokens over a period of time.
  - Use this metric to understand your TPS or TPM based utilization for PTUs and compare to your benchmarks for target TPS or TPM for your scenarios.

> All Metrics applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.

items.name: Metric - Active Tokens by Model Deployment Name

content.json:
#### Metrics Description
- **Provisioned-Managed Utilization**: Utilization % for a provisoned-managed deployment, calculated as (PTUs consumed / PTUs deployed) x 100.
  - When utilization is greater than or equal to 100%, calls are throttled and error code 429 returned.

items.name: Metric - Provisioned-managed Utilization by Model Name
Metric - Provisioned-managed Utilization by Model Version

content.title: Provisioned-managed Utilization by Model Deployment Name

items.name: Metric - Provisioned-managed Utilization by Model Deployment Name

content.json:
#### Metrics Description
- **Processed FineTuned Training Hours**: Number of training hours processed on an OpenAI finetuned model.

content.title: Processed FineTuned Training Hours by Model Name

parameters.name: SubscriptionLA
parameters.label: Workspace Subscriptions
parameters.description: All subscriptions with Azure Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.description: Log Analytics Workspace(s) with Azure OpenAI logs

parameters.name: modeldeploymentname
parameters.label: Model Deployment Name
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName)
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200    
    and isnotempty(modelDeploymentName)
| distinct modelDeploymentName

parameters.name: modelname
parameters.label: Model Name
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName)
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})          
    and isnotempty(modelName)
| distinct modelName

parameters.name: modelversion
parameters.label: Model Version
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=tostring(properties.modelVersion),
        streamType=properties.streamType        
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and isnotempty(modelVersion)
| distinct modelVersion

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.label: API Version
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})    
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})      
    and isnotempty(apiVersion)
| distinct apiVersion

parameters.name: OperationName
parameters.label: Operation Name
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})    
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})    
    and isnotempty(OperationName)
| distinct OperationName

parameters.name: streamtype
parameters.label: Stream Type
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=tostring(properties.streamType),
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})    
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and isnotempty(streamType)
| distinct streamType

parameters.name: location
parameters.label: Location
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend Location = location_s
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})    
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})    
    and streamType in ({streamtype})    
    and isnotempty(Location)
| distinct Location

parameters.name: apiVersionFailure
parameters.label: API Version
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 404    
    and isnotempty(apiVersion)
| distinct apiVersion

parameters.name: OperationNameFailure
parameters.label: Operation Name
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 404
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})    
    and isnotempty(OperationName)
| distinct OperationName

parameters.name: streamtypeFailure
parameters.label: Stream Type
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend streamType=tostring(properties.streamType),
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 404
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})
    and OperationName in ({OperationNameFailure})
    and isnotempty(streamType)
| distinct streamType

parameters.name: locationFailure
parameters.label: Location
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
    and Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend Location = location_s
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 404
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})
    and OperationName in ({OperationNameFailure})    
    and streamType in ({streamtypeFailure})    
    and isnotempty(Location)
| distinct Location

content.json:
### Azure OpenAI Logs Dashboard
Explore the most important Logs for Azure OpenAI Service and understand your usage trends easily.
[Azure OpenAI Metrics](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/how-to/monitoring#azure-openai-metrics)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')        
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by Resource
content.title: Requests by Resource

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend Location = location_s        
| where OperationName !has "_List"
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by Location
content.title: Requests by Location

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend streamType=properties.streamType
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by tostring(streamType)
content.title: Requests by Stream Type

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend streamType=properties.streamType
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by tostring(apiVersion)
content.title: Requests by Api Version

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by tostring(modelDeploymentName), tostring(modelName), OperationName
| sort by tostring(modelDeploymentName) asc
content.title: Requests by Model Deployment Name + Operation Name

items.name: query - RequestResponse by Model Deployment Name + Operation Name

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"

| where OperationName !has "_List"

    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count() by tostring(modelDeploymentName)

AzureDiagnostics

| sort by OperationName asc

AzureDiagnostics

| summarize count() by tostring(OperationName)
content.title: Requests by Operation Name

content.json:
### Averages
Averages of duration (ms), requestLength (bytes) and responseLength (bytes) by Model Deployment Name, Model Name and Operation Names.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize count(modelDeploymentName), avg(DurationMs) by tostring(modelDeploymentName), tostring(modelName), OperationName
| sort by tostring(modelDeploymentName) asc
content.title: Requests by Avg Duration (ms)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend ModelAndOperation = strcat(modelDeploymentName," (",OperationName,")")
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})
| summarize avg(DurationMs) by tostring(ModelAndOperation)
| sort by tostring(ModelAndOperation) asc

content.json:
### By CallerIP
All success "Request / Response" (Status Code: 200) operational logs, with the exclusion of administration logs divided by CallerIP Address.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "200"
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location}) 
| summarize count() by CallerIPAddress
content.title: Requests by Caller IP Address

content.json:
### All Successful Requests
All success *"Request / Response"* (Status Code: 200) operational logs, with the exclusion of administration logs.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend modelDeploymentName=tostring(properties.modelDeploymentName),
        modelName=tostring(properties.modelName),
        modelVersion=properties.modelVersion,
        streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName),
        objectId=tostring(properties.objectId)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == 200
    and modelDeploymentName in ({modeldeploymentname})
    and modelName in ({modelname})    
    and modelVersion in ({modelversion})
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersion})
    and OperationName in ({OperationName})    
    and streamType in ({streamtype})
    and location_s in ({location})    
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Resource,
    modelDeploymentName=properties.modelDeploymentName,
    modelName=properties.modelName,
    OperationName,
    DurationMs,
    requestLength=properties.requestLength,
    responseLength=properties.responseLength,    
    streamType,    
    CallerIPAddress,
    apiVersion,
    modelVersion,
    //requestTime=properties.requestTime,    
    //responseTime=properties.responseTime,
    objectId,
    Location=location_s,
    ResultSignature
    | sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Successful requests

content.json:
### All failed requests
All failed *"Request / Response"* (Status Code: 404) operational logs, with the exclusion of administration logs.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend streamType=properties.streamType
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "404"
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})
    and OperationName in ({OperationNameFailure})
    and streamType in ({streamtypeFailure})
    and location_s in ({locationFailure})
| summarize count() by tostring(Resource)
content.title: Failed requests by Resource

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend streamType=properties.streamType,
        apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| extend streamType=properties.streamType
| where OperationName !has "_List"
    and Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
    and ResultSignature == "404"
    and apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})
    and OperationName in ({OperationNameFailure})
    and streamType in ({streamtypeFailure})
    and location_s in ({locationFailure})
| summarize count() by tostring(streamType)
content.title: Failed requests by streamType

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where Category == "RequestResponse"
| extend properties = parse_json(properties_s)
| extend streamType=properties.streamType
| extend apiName=tostring(properties.apiName)
| extend apiVersion = replace_string(apiName, 'Azure OpenAI API version ', '')
| where OperationName !has "_List"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where toint(ResultSignature) >= 400
| where location_s in ({locationFailure})
| where streamType in ({streamtypeFailure})
| where OperationName in ({OperationNameFailure})
| where apiVersion in ({apiVersionFailure})
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Resource,
    OperationName,
    DurationMs,
    requestLength=properties.requestLength,
    responseLength=properties.responseLength,    
    streamType=properties.streamType,    
    CallerIPAddress,
    apiVersion,
    Location=location_s,
    ResultSignature
    | sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Failed requests
